This app demonstrates:

1. Basic Chat Setup:
   - Custom ID
   - Initial messages (including hidden system message)
   - Error handling configuration

2. UI Configuration:
   - Custom placeholder text
   - Full width and height settings
   - Fill parameter for layout control

3. Message Transformations:
   - User input transformation (converts to uppercase)
   - Assistant response transformation (adds robot emoji)

4. Core Functionality:
   - Message handling
   - Simple response generation
   - Proper async/await usage

To use the app:
1. Save the code as `app.py`
2. Install required packages: `pip install shiny`
3. Run with: `shiny run app.py`

The app demonstrates:
- Message handling
- Input/output transformations
- UI customization
- Error handling
- Async operations

The app keeps things minimal while showcasing all major Chat parameters and capabilities. It uses express mode for simpler syntax and avoids unnecessary components.

You can interact with it by:
1. Typing "hello" to get a greeting
2. Typing "help" to get information
3. Typing "bye" to get a farewell
4. Typing anything else to see it echoed back

The transformations will be visible in the chat:
- Your messages will appear in uppercase
- Assistant responses will have a robot emoji prefix
